name: Bitdefender_Init_Scan
author: Tomas Kabrt
description: Initiating full scan of the endpoint your event in one click!

configurationItems.name: Bitdefender_API_Key
configurationItems.description: A Bitdefender API key with sufficent rights to initiate a scan

configurationItems.name: Bitdefender_Url
configurationItems.description: URL of your Bitdefender API, must be accessible from Cortex server. eg: https://cloudgz.gravityzone.bitdefender.com/api/v1.0/jsonrpc/network
